quote: Maybe he thought I would run then. Maybe he thought I would be done. But I had been hurt before. I think he underestimated my ability to pick myself up and keep going. Done? Far from it.
quote_letters: MAYBE HE THOUGHT I WOULD RUN THEN MAYBE HE THOUGHT I WOULD BE DONE BUT I HAD BEEN HURT BEFORE I THINK HE UNDERESTIMATED MY ABILITY TO PICK MYSELF UP AND KEEP GOING DONE FAR FROM IT
